message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. I think it's a great deal considering its value, but I'm open to negotiation.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $120 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $140, which is still a fair price for both of us. Let's see if we can find common ground.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm comfortable going up to $130 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
